explanation: [0-0] A transparent bowl is placed on a white object. Inside the bowl, there's some cocoa powder. Below the image, there's a white caption "sweetened condensed milk + cocoa powder". In the upper left corner, there's a finger and some white objects.

[0-6] A silver container filled with sweetened condensed milk pours all its content onto the cocoa powder, covering it completely. Then, a hand holding a pink spoon starts mixing. After a while, the cocoa powder and sweetened condensed milk are fully combined, forming a brown mixture. Next, a hand takes a piece of the mixture, while a white caption "chill" appears below the image.
